channel.title: Creating Databases [MySQL]
channel.description:
I'm really new to web development & MySQL and try'd to create a database on my own, it went horribly wrong and nothing was loaded from my databases lol. If someone would take the time to show & explain to me how to create a database for each one of these classes , I'd really appreciate it. So here we go :cool:
In the first class I was simply just establishing database connection :
http://pastie.org/5659358
The Second class was for handling donations and here that is :
http://pastie.org/5659364
The third class was just suppose to handle just the general login of any user and here that is:
http://pastie.org/5659366
Lastly the final class which is very similar to the third is basically to load moderators and administrators and here is the code for that:
http://pastie.org/5659368
I'm not sure if this allowed in this section but I'd like I said before I'd really appreciate if someone took the time to help me with this, Thanks in Advance :D

item.title: Creating Databases [MySQL]
item.dc:creator: @mike4ever mike4ever
item.description:
@mike4ever wrote:

RSCShadow:

I’d say this should be in general unless you’re making a website in Java.

Nah because I’ making the website run those classes threw MySQL but the overall website isn’t java at all.

Read full topic
